name: Dancing Bullets: Online Minigames
description:
Dancing Bullets is an online multiplayer party-styled game where you race against others and see who gets crowned the winner!
Move: W, A, S, D or Controller Left Analog Stick Jump: Space or Controller Right Button (B on XBOX, O on PS4) The game is currently under ALPHA edition. I am currently the only developer working on this game, I would appreciate if you please leave your suggestions and report bugs you encounter.  What to expect? 
  • More minigames!
  • More SFX!
  • More VFX!
  • More characters!
  • More music!
Hope you enjoy the game, much love. :)  Currently, only one test server is available. Only a maximum of 20 players will be able to play at the same time.
